version_description:
Get the new version of the application!
In it we tried to make the application faster, more convenient and more user friendly. Besides, we added about 100 000 new photos from around the world!

Thank you for staying with us! We have great plans for the development of the application. Check out for updates.

Time Portal Team

Get the new version of the application!
In it we tried to make the application faster, more convenient and more user friendly. Besides, we added about 100 000 new photos from around the world!

Thank you for staying with us! We have great plans for the development of the application. Check out for updates.

Time Portal Team

We brought the widget back!

And not only brought it back but completely rewrote it. Now it works faster and is easier to use: Switch photos by tapping, and if you want to open a photo in the app in order to see all the smallest details, press your finger on the photo and hold it there for a while.

In addition we corrected the translations a little. By the way, if you noticed a mistake in translations please feel free to write us. We shall correct everything.

In connection with the release of the new iPhone and iOS 12 we adjusted the app so that even the richest users will be able to enjoy our app.

We are also expecting reviews about the app on the AppStore. They are very important for us.

Thank you for staying with us and checking for updates!

We brought the widget back!

And not only brought it back but completely rewrote it. Now it works faster and is easier to use: Switch photos by tapping, and if you want to open a photo in the app in order to see all the smallest details, press your finger on the photo and hold it there for a while.

In addition we corrected the translations a little. By the way, if you noticed a mistake in translations please feel free to write us. We shall correct everything.

In connection with the release of the new iPhone and iOS 12 we adjusted the app so that even the richest users will be able to enjoy our app.

We are also expecting reviews about the app on the AppStore. They are very important for us.

Thank you for staying with us and checking for updates!

Unfortunately, things did not go as smoothly with the version 2.0.2 as we had planned. We wanted to leave free access to all internal features for all the users that had been with us since before the update, but just one extra line of code ruined everything. Dear friends, please accept our sincere apologies! The guilty party has already been punished, and you can find the latest version in the AppStore. We hope everything will be fine now

Unfortunately, things did not go as smoothly with the version 2.0.2 as we had planned. We wanted to leave free access to all internal features for all the users that had been with us since before the update, but just one extra line of code ruined everything. Dear friends, please accept our sincere apologies! The guilty party has already been punished, and you can find the latest version in the AppStore. We hope everything will be fine now

Hey guys! A new update is out!

You've asked and we've listened:
- View photos in full screen. Just tap once on the photo
- Tap twice to zoom in
- Check download status of photos when viewing the map

Also we've fixed some bugs:
- Location accuracy improved
- Bigger limit of photos in Favorites

We also want to remind you that we have a widget! It can show you photos nearby (tap once to view the next one or use 3D touch to view the photo in the app).

We want to know what you think! Drop us a line through the Contact Us form in Settings.

Premium version is on offer until the end of next week! Yay!

Time Portal Team

Hey guys! A new update is out!

You've asked and we've listened:
- View photos in full screen. Just tap once on the photo
- Tap twice to zoom in
- Check download status of photos when viewing the map

Also we've fixed some bugs:
- Location accuracy improved
- Bigger limit of photos in Favorites

We also want to remind you that we have a widget! It can show you photos nearby (tap once to view the next one or use 3D touch to view the photo in the app).

We want to know what you think! Drop us a line through the Contact Us form in Settings.

Premium version is on offer until the end of next week! Yay!

Time Portal Team

Hey, there's a new version in the store!

We've made several small, but good, changes.

* Adapted the design for the new iPhone XS Max
* Added geolocation metadata to stored photographs - now you can see where a stored photo was taken straight from the Photos app
* Heightened the swipe sensitivity of the gallery screen - it now requires a less intense finger movement to close this screen
*And, most interestingly - all photos displayed on your map will now be indexed by name by the built-in iOS Spotlight mechanism. This means that beginning with this update you can directly search for a photo by its title through the global iOS search

Also, don't forget that we have a widget which shows photos taken near you. You can tap to move to the next photo. If you want to open the current photo in the app, just press down for a couple of seconds and the app will open it for you.

Don't forget to send us feedback and write to us at feedback@timeportal.app - we're happy to hear any features you'd like to see or other suggestions!

The Time Portal Team

Hey, there's a new version in the store!

We've made several small, but good, changes.

* Adapted the design for the new iPhone XS Max
* Added geolocation metadata to stored photographs - now you can see where a stored photo was taken straight from the Photos app
* Heightened the swipe sensitivity of the gallery screen - it now requires a less intense finger movement to close this screen
*And, most interestingly - all photos displayed on your map will now be indexed by name by the built-in iOS Spotlight mechanism. This means that beginning with this update you can directly search for a photo by its title through the global iOS search

Also, don't forget that we have a widget which shows photos taken near you. You can tap to move to the next photo. If you want to open the current photo in the app, just press down for a couple of seconds and the app will open it for you.

Don't forget to send us feedback and write to us at feedback@timeportal.app - we're happy to hear any features you'd like to see or other suggestions!

The Time Portal Team

With each new version we make our application even faster and more convenient! Thank you for being with us and don't forget to email us at support@timeportal.app about any suggestions and suggestions.

With respect,
Time Portal team

With each new version we make our application even faster and more convenient! In this update, we fixed the bugs that were found by our users, as well as improved the performance of the application while working with the map. Thank you for being with us and do not forget to email us at support@timeportal.app about any wishes and suggestions.

Respectfully,
